profile.name: Ajay D'Souza
profile.tagline: Helping WordPress professionals build better businesses
profile.bio: I’m Ajay D’Souza — WordPress developer, blogger, and investment banker based in London. I’ve been building plugins since 2005, blogging since 2003, and running Beyond Develop Ltd — the agency behind the WebberZone suite of WordPress tools. I enjoy creating, sharing, and helping people do more with WordPress.
